Acko.description: This plan covers damage caused by your car to others and their property, but does not cover any damage caused to your car.

Acko.description:
This plan covers theft, damage from fire, accidents, and natural disasters, as well as the full cost of replaced parts during repairs.

It also covers accidental damage caused by your car to others and their property.

addons.description: Cover engine and gearbox damage due to floods or heavy rains, as well as engine damage from oil/coolant leakage during an accident.
addons.title: Save yourself from costly engine repairs

• 24x7 car breakdown assistance

benefits: Accidents: Covers repair/replacement costs if your car is damaged in an accident.
Fire: Covers the damages caused due to self-ignition, explosion or lightning.
Theft: If your car is stolen, we will pay you the value of your car as per your policy.
Calamities: We will cover damage caused by natural or man-made calamities such as earthquakes, riots, etc.
Rat bite damages: Cover the damages caused by rat bites.
Third-party injury/death: We provide coverage for death/ injuries caused to individuals outside of your vehicle in accidents involving your car.
Third-party property: We also cover any damage/loss to third-party property.

sections.label: (D) Own Damage Premium after Discount (A - B + C)

benefits: Accidents: Covers repair/replacement costs if your car is damaged in an accident.
Fire: Covers the damages caused due to self-ignition, explosion or lightning.
Theft: If your car is stolen, we will pay you the value of your car as per your policy.
Calamities: We will cover damage caused by natural or man-made calamities such as earthquakes, riots, etc.
Rat bite damages: Cover the damages caused by rat bites.
Third-party injury/death: We provide coverage for death/ injuries caused to individuals outside of your vehicle in accidents involving your car.
Third-party property: We also cover any damage/loss to third-party property.
Zero Depreciation: Covers total cost of parts replaced, due to loss or damage to the insured vehicle, without any deduction towards depreciation

sections.label: (D) Own Damage Premium after Discount (A - B + C)
